Hi! We’re Nord Projects.

We’re a small team that works like a startup to build products that delight customers and solve real business problems.

We love making things. We’ve been working together since 2012 on projects like Tingbot and Mixim. These are the projects we love best - where great design and solid engineering make the complex simple.

We work across mobile, web, backend and IoT. We like to work on:

  • Strategy: transform business goals and user needs into a compelling proposition
  • Design: create meaningful products with a beautiful look and a wonderful feel
  • Development: attention to detail and solid engineering provides a codebase that’s an asset to your business

And sometimes we build our own.
